name: Sarlacc
Lore: 'Very patient predator in the Dune Sea. Tentacles can grab prey up to four meters away. Digests victims for 1000 years. Often fed prisoners by Jabba the Hutt.',
Text: '* Ferocity = 4 + destiny. Habitat: Great Pit Of Carkoon. If Sarlacc eats a captive, may retrieve 1 Force for each of your aliens here. Anything eaten by Sarlacc is placed out of play.',
